title: A Single Reddit Post Exposed an Indian Student at Elite College as a Fraud
selftext: One shocking thing was how CBSE in the Modi-era of BJP governance is eager to pass students like a Government School at UP despite scoring only 11-15 marks (highest) that too in Physical Education & English in science stream and it all started from there to now disgrace the authenticity for all Indians seeking future grant of any kind.
